content:
The group, Harmony Hearts, could perform their second performance on a festival such as "Summer Sonic." This festival is one of the biggest and most well-known festivals in Japan, held annually in Tokyo and Osaka and features a diverse lineup of both international and domestic acts, it's a great platform for new and upcoming artists to showcase their talents and gain more exposure and recognition.

Summer Sonic is a festival that has a lot of media coverage and it's a great opportunity for the group to gain more exposure and recognition. This festival is a big step for them to reach a wider audience and attract more fans. The festival will also give them a chance to interact with other artists, bands and music enthusiasts and learn from them.
